io.micronaut.cache.interceptor

Class CacheInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.cache.interceptor.CacheInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interceptor<Object,Object>, MethodInterceptor<Object,Object>, Ordered

    @Singleton
public class CacheInterceptor
extends Object
implements MethodInterceptor<Object,Object>

    An AOP MethodInterceptor implementation for the Cache annotations Cacheable, CachePut and CacheInvalidate.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
